MWC.GUI

Class DataListenerAdaptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.DataListenerAdaptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layers.DataListener, Layers.DataListener2

    public abstract class DataListenerAdaptor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Layers.DataListener2
    this class provides a no-op default instantiation of a data listener, it is to be extended by any concrete class expecting to handle data listener messages

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean _suspendUpdates
      flag to indicate that the Layers object should suspend updates, just for a while
